meanings.definition: A small flag or pennant carried as a military standard.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly held the guidon during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The guidon fluttered in the wind as the troops marched forward.
meanings.sent3: The guidon looked like a tiny colorful kite flying in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The guidon stood tall like a beacon of unity amidst the soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The guidon's bright colors made it easy to spot in the distance.

meanings.definition: A military or naval unit flag.
meanings.sent1: The guidon marked the location of the battalion headquarters.
meanings.sent2: The sailors saluted as the guidon was raised on the ship.
meanings.sent3: The guidon was so big that it almost covered the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The guidon symbolized the strength and pride of the military unit.
meanings.sent5: The guidon waved proudly at the front of the formation.
